title: A Moment Of Silence
body:
Let us all join in for a moment, and close our eyes and take a moment of silence in respect for the loss of our dear friends today. Many Poros were lost in the battle of Snowbound. All in the name of summoning the King. Thank you for your time. 

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TRU5f6uPGbo/UrTaCTenUCI/AAAAAAAAW-w/Floul8JESYk/s1600/Poro+9.png


(Source: http://applewaffles.tumblr.com/)

replies.body: http://promo.na.leagueoflegends.com/assets/snowdown-2014/img/home/poro.png
Thats pretty sweet. HUEHUEHUEHUE{{champion:82}}

> [{quoted}](name=RottedApples,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WnXHnV8U,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2014-12-16T21:16:26.779+0000)
>
> Thats pretty sweet. HUEHUEHUEHUE{{champion:82}}

This name choice continues to prove itself #worth

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sweet,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WnXHnV8U,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2014-12-16T21:23:00.761+0000)
>
> This name choice continues to prove itself #worth

I like my feed on the sweet side ;)

So when you feed in matches, you always make sure your champions tastes sweet for the enemy?? =P

P.S. o.o what is with your profile. got curious, went to it, 0 normal wins, nothing on match history o.o 20 blank rune pages and 10 blank mastery pages. What....

I'm a facade!

Ps when I feed I don't get sweet I get salty.
mmm, salt. I like salt. give me moar, pl0x
...I can't be the only one thinking of the Worms Kamikazes while looking at this.
No you're not.
Once again a monarchy crushes the little people under its foot in the name of divine right!
good thing it's a very fuzzy foot {{summoner:31}}

Rest well my friends.

{{summoner:31}} {{item:2010}}

I'm sorry, that's a biscuit. Do you want the poro to die of food poisoning? In the future, always use {{item:2052}} or{{item:2054}} , as other foods may cause disease in poros. Their bodies aren't equipped to handle human food! 

Spread the word and save poro lives today!

#NoBiscuits
#Porosnax
#Snaxforall
I don't think a biscuit would bother a poro. {{summoner:31}}
But they liiiiiiiike it they've been training. Poros are immortal; just before they hit a target they explode into snow, then return by your side a few seconds later
They can use "Shunshin no jutsu", that's why.
Please don't make me feel bad about launching Poros, I want those summoner icons

Personally, I see poros as both parts fluffy fuzzy animal and force of nature. When they "die", I think they really just explode and recombine :)

Notice how it says "Your team has DISPELLED the Poro King" and not "SLAIN". So very much like a daemon from the warp, making a poro explode simply spirits it away for a bit. Also poros apparently reproduce asexually by eating Poro Snax :3

And maybe they magically drop cured skins and other animal-based products when they're dispelled (hence the poro-skin rug in Winter Wonder {{champion:61}}'s splash). Solves a lot of problems without the suicidal guilt :D

Still, I'd imagine that they don't like getting hurt in and of itself. Good thing they don't mind {{summoner:31}}.
Makes sense. I mean, when you feed a poro 10 Poro snax on the howlying abyss, it blows up into multiple little poros. Poros never die!{{summoner:31}}
poro's don't die, they just explode into 10 smaller poro's we cant see. that's why we can keep throwing them endlessly :p

Snowbound?

You talking about Snowdown Showdown Smackdown Smashdown?

Or Earthbound: Winter Wonderland Edition?

The Poro king, most furriest and highly proud
Stood upon his servants pile of remains
And he wore his crown and shout out loud
"We wil get the cookies and brake the chains"
And he rushed and strode and then he smote 
what was left of any doubt.

The Poro king, the Poro king
Show us the way of life
Just a smile and joy us bring
The Poro king and his wife

{{summoner:31}}  who's his wife?
{{champion:34}} or {{champion:20}} or {{champion:106}} or  {{champion:44}} or  {{champion:113}}

You don't know her?
Then let me introduce her to you:
{{item:3070}} {{item:2050}} {{item:3070}} That is why we have {{summoner:10}}

> [{quoted}](name=Deustheproducer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WnXHnV8U,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-16T20:23:23.467+0000)
>
> Let us all join in for a moment, and close our eyes and take a moment of silence

Silence, you say?? {{champion:91}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:38}} What is that. How to silence 101: ....

Whats the poro queen look like?
Please make her model ty :D

Finally, a way to kill those fuzzy little monsters!
AND you get to dethrone the king.

Lets put an end to the furry menace once and for all. PORO ELIMINATION SQUADS, UNITE!
{{summoner:31}} "They trained all year for this!"
Have to play this game mode. But my computer is broken q_q
Hehm, the sound effects are seriously Lemmings-esque, which just gives me some serious nostalgia
haha

They are becoming hero for sacrificing themselves for summoning the king ritual...

I wonder where the king go when Showdown ends???

> [{quoted}](name=tripleDee,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WnXHnV8U,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-16T21:40:08.613+0000)
>
> They are becoming an hero

ftfy
